metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1286 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Google V8, as used in Google Chrome before 10.0.648.127, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors that trigger incorrect access to memory.

notes.Note: mikesalvatore> The Ubuntu Security Team does not support libv8

criterions.comment: libv8-3.14: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'libv8 not supported').
